data.name: CoH 2 - German Commander: Osttruppen Doctrine
data.detailed_description:
GERMAN COMMANDER: Osttruppen Doctrine
Mobilize early-game infantry and improved resources to overwhelm your opponents and gain early map control.

  • Railway Artillery Support
    Off-map railway artillery will fire three large caliber shells at the designated target.
  • Supply Drop Zone
    Cargo planes will fly over a designated Fuel or Munitions point, dropping off resource crates that can be recovered by infantry.
  • Trench
    Allows German infantry to dig defensive trenchs.
  • Artillery Field Officer
    An Artillery Field Officer specializing in supporting troops is allocated to your command.
  • Osttruppen Squad
    Deploy weak but numerous Osttruppen infantry to the battlefield.

data.short_description: GERMAN COMMANDER: Osttruppen DoctrineMobilize early-game infantry and improved resources to overwhelm your opponents and gain early map control.Railway Artillery SupportOff-map railway artillery will fire three large caliber shells at the designated target.
data.supported_languages:
Czech, English*, French*, German*, Italian, Polish*, Russian*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: 32bit Vista
  • Processor: 2Ghz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Direct3D 10 capable video card (GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 2900XT)
  • DirectX®: 11
  • Hard Drive: 30GB free Hard disc space
  • Internet: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum Requirements
  • OS OS X 10.10.3
  • Processor 1.8Ghz Intel
  • RAM 4GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 512MB (Nvidia 6xx series or later, AMD 7xxx series or later and Intel Iris Pro).
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended Requirements
  • OS OS X 10.10.3
  • Processor 2.4Ghz Intel
  • RAM 8GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 4GB (Nvidia 780MX, AMD D700 or R9 295X)
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum Requirements
  • OS Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
  • Processor 2.6 GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent.
  • RAM 4GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 1GB*
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
    *Requires an Intel Iris Pro graphics card or an NVIDIA 600 series graphics card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended Requirements
  • OS Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
  • Processor 3.4 GHz Intel i5 quad core or equivalent.
  • RAM 8GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 4GB**
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
    **NVIDIA 760 series card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
